thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Caroline Clear Conroy
thread.title_full: Its4women reviewed by Caroline Clear Conroy

author: Caroline Clear Conroy
title: Caroline Clear Conroy
text: I tried to change over my policy online today as my husband was at the garage to collect my new car. The site would not recognise the reg and when I put it in manually and answered all questions and clicked the final button my policy did not update- I tried several times and am now very stressed (and 34 weeks pregnant). The phone number gave me various options to pick over at least 5 mins before telling me itwasn't an option to get through but I could request a call back. Call back took an hour and a half. Not at all acceptable and I am regretting my decision to leave my old provider for the sake of a couple of Euro and seriously thinking of using my cooking off period option
